game.name: River Runners
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: River Runners is a cooperative multiplayer adventure where you and your friends navigate a dangerous, unpredictable river. Clear communication and teamwork are essential to steer the raft, overcome hidden challenges, and survive the journey to the end.
game.shortDescriptionEn: River Runners is a cooperative multiplayer adventure where you and your friends navigate a dangerous, unpredictable river. Clear communication and teamwork are essential to steer the raft, overcome hidden challenges, and survive the journey to the end.
